name: Lineup Puzzle Challenge
description:
Lineup Puzzle is a new puzzle game designed by Tetris author Alexey Pajitnov. Puzzle master adds another dimension to his creation.

• Form a full line of blocks either horizontally or vertically to score and remove it up from the playfield;
• Building crossing lines cleans out these lines and creates a Star in the intersection;
• Place a shape onto empty cells with the Stars to increase a score for it;
• Collect stars in challenges to increase main score multiplier;
• Keep the playfield from filling with the blocks.

Unique Lineup features:
• Fun and simple gameplay;
• 600 FILL challenges;
• 600 ROTATE challenges;
• 600 MIRROR challenges;
• 5+5+5 new challenges daily

It’s time to drop in for a challenge in the newest creation of puzzle guru Alexey Pajitnov.
